p: Phenolic compounds are the pronounced secondary metabolite of the plant, which act as antiaging, antimicrobial, anticancer, anti-inflammatory, antioxidant, antiproliferative, cardioprotective, and immune system-promoting agents [ 21, 22]. The total phenolic content of ADBB was found to be 228.53 ± 0.65 mg GAE/g dry extract weight, which may significantly contribute to the various biological activities and became fruitful in the promotion of human health.
